Desc.entry: A registered charity which is the result of a merger of Multilingual City Forum and the Association of Sheffield Community Language Schools. Promotes all forms of language use and learning in Sheffield including the life-long learning of languages and the use of the city and region's community languages. Supports complementary language schools by organising training and developing curricula, putting on conferences, publishing newsletters and organising seminars and workshops around issues of language learning and language provision. Links language providers across sectors from schools to higher education, private language providers, complementary language schools, translators and business. A registered company no 4333416
